nawa adhyapana prathisanskarana wadapiliwela kriyawata nanwima sandaha swadhina suparikshana mandalayak pihituwimatath, wasara 13 ka akhanda pasal adhyapanaya aniwarya kirimatath, sama pasal sisuwakuta ma saukhya rakshanawaranayak labadime wadapiliwela aarambha kirimatath, a.po.sa. usas pela hadarana siyalu sisunta ha guruwarunta tab pariganaka labadimatath, ema tab pariganakawalata awashya wishaya nirdesha ha igenum pahasukam athulath kirimatath me wanawita katayuthu sudanam kara athi bawath adhyapana amathiwaraya sandahan karayi.
oyita wada hoda nadda deyiyane, bayik eke yanakota oyata wamane yayida danna, shatha panahak katata daganna kiwwa nam..
me liyana mohotha wanawita aprikawe mandaposhanayen dahas gananak miyayana muth owun nisa aprikawe, yuropaye ho lokaye kisima rataka kotas weladapolata balapamak ella karanne na.
ee adhyayana katayuthu, gamane dushkarakama ha bhayanaka kama, nithi rithi, mila mudal wage dewal.

emenma rate sampath sthirawama thibena than nigamanayata da mema chandrika thakshanayen labena mahath pitiwahala apa agaya kala yuthu wanawa.‚Äúrohitha rajapakshagenmerata abhyawakasha widyawa nanwannamila kala nohaki sewayak‚Äùmerata abhyawakasha widyawa nanwimehila rohitha rajapaksha mahathagen mila kala nohaki sewayak ituwana bawa supi‡∑äram sat samuha wyaparaye sabhapathi aar. em. maniwannan mahatha pawasanawa.supi‡∑äram sat aayathanaye thakshana anshaye pradhaniya menma aayathanaye thakshanika upadeshakawaraya lesa janadhipathige bala puth rohitha rajapaksha mahatha katayuthu karana bawa da maniwannan mahatha pawasa sitinawa.abhyawakasha widyawa sambandhawa merata injineruwan itha alpa bawa penwa dena maniwannan mahatha nasa aayathanaye sewaya karana pirisen 10% kata aasanna pramanayak shri lankikayan bawa da pawasayi.supi‡∑äram sat aayathanaya ha sambandhawa katayuthu karana amerika, china, kanada aayathanayanhi boho pirisa rohitha rajapaksha mahathage sewaya agaya kara athayi da supi‡∑äram sat palamu chandrikawa kakshagatha kirimehila ohugen wishala sahayak labena bawa da ohu penwa denawa.
